Question: In 1969, this person accepted a specially created 'Fellowship for Distinction in Science' to remain at Caius.
Hints: This person went up to Oxford University in October 1959 at the age of 17.
This person was born on 8 January 1942 to Frank and Isobel ****.
Some colleagues were resentful of the attention this person received, feeling it was due of his disability.
